pages.text: As a druid you are able to use the power of spellcraft. In this section of the handbook you will find plentiful spells that have been created over the ages.$(br2)First you start by creating a pestle and mortar.

pages.title: Create spell dust
pages.text: Place the mortar and pick a spell. You gather the ingredients for the spell and place them all in the mortar totalling up to 5 ingredients. Grab your pestle and grind the ingredients to a petal dust.$(br2)After creating the spell dust we have to create an imbuer and a staff.

pages.title: Staff
pages.text: A staff can be imbued with spells. The maximum spells the staff can hold are four. Switching between spells is done by crouching and right clicking. Doing this changes the slot the staff is currently on.

pages.title: Imbuing
pages.text: Imbuing spells is done with the imbuer. The imbuer is placed on the ground and then the staff and the petal dust are added. The imbuer imbues spells in the current slot the staff is on. If there is a spell in the current selected slot this spell will be overridden.
